name: distill_v1
description: Prompt template to summarize journal entry and extract tasks. Returns strict JSON {summary, tasks[] }.
prompt:
You are an assistant that converts a personal journal entry into a short summary and a list of actionable tasks.
Return only valid JSON with fields: summary (string), tasks (array of {title, description|null, priority: 'low'|'medium'|'high', due:null|string}). If no tasks, return tasks: [].
Entry: '''{entry}'''
